RelatedSentence: Massachusetts to drivers : ' Use yah blinkah ' BOSTON - Perhaps the reason notoriously aggressive Boston drivers do n't use their turn signals is that no one 's ever put it in terms they understand .
The Massachusetts Department of Transportation on Friday changed that by posting messages on electronic highway signs around the city that read : Changing Lanes ?

Blinkah is how Bostonians pronounce blinker , otherwise known as a turn signal .
